attributes.action: Give recognition to Mr Bernard Kenny, the brave 77 year old ex-miner
attributes.background: This brave man tryed to stop the attack on Jo Cox MP I'd like to offer my deep respect to Mr Bernard Kenny, the brave 77 year old ex-miner who got out of his car to try to stop the attack on Jo Cox... He's still in hospital after being seriously stabbed "in the abdomen"... A real hero

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do. Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
